item.title: Help please im newb(++ if you help)
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

go to client class

find
public boolean AttackNPC() {

a bit lower you will see

				if (FightType != 3) {
					TotalExp = (double)(100);
					TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
					} else {
					TotalExp = (double)(30.33);
					TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
				}
				TotalExp = (double)(100);
				TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
				addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
			}

addSkillXp adds XP’s change TotalExp *2 to double it… etc…

Read full topic
